title: Discover the Top Wallpaper Trends for 2025
description: As we step into 2025, the world of interior design is set to embrace a vibrant transformation, with custom murals and wallpapers taking center stage. These artistic wall coverings are no longer just a backdrop but a statement piece that defines the character of a room. With an array of new trends emerging, homeowners and […] You're reading Discover the Top Wallpaper Trends for 2025, originally posted on Decoist. If you enjoyed this post, be sure to follow Decoist on Twitter, Facebook and Pinterest.
author: Samantha Franco
excerpt: Give your walls a glow-up with 2025's coolest wallpaper trends—think bold designs, moody vibes, and eye-catching details.
text: As we step into 2025, the world of interior design is set to embrace a vibrant transformation, with custom murals and wallpapers taking center stage. These artistic wall coverings are no longer just a backdrop but a statement piece that defines the character of a room. With an array of new trends emerging, homeowners and designers alike are excited to explore the possibilities that these creative designs offer. Whether you’re looking to make a bold statement or add a subtle touch of elegance, the wallpaper trends of 2025 promise to inspire and captivate. Adding Playful Charm to Your Walls Through Whimsical Patterns Photo Credit: chrislovesjulia Whimsical patterns are set to bring a sense of playfulness and charm to our living spaces. These designs, characterized by their cheeky and imaginative motifs, offer a delightful way to infuse personality into any room. Think of nature-inspired elements like foliage, mushrooms, and birds, or playful images such as hot air balloons and circus scenes. Photo Credit: Envato / pro_creator The beauty of whimsical patterns lies in their ability to transform a space into a lively and inviting environment. Whether you opt for a dark, whimsigoth style or a bright, vibrant display, these patterns are sure to spark joy and creativity in your home. Embrace the unexpected and let your walls tell a story with these enchanting designs. Creating Cozy and Dramatic Spaces with Dark and Moody Color Schemes Photo Credit: House Diamond For those who prefer a more sophisticated and intimate atmosphere, dark and moody palettes are making a strong comeback. Rich tones like navy, emerald, and charcoal are being used to create dramatic spaces that exude elegance and warmth. These deep hues, often paired with gold or brass accents, offer a timeless and cozy setting that feels both luxurious and inviting. Photo Credit: Envato / pro_creator By incorporating moody wallpapers into your home, you can craft a space that feels like a comforting retreat, perfect for unwinding after a long day. Whether used in a bedroom, living room, or study, these palettes provide a sense of depth and character that is both captivating and enduring. Bringing Nature Indoors With Detailed Botanicals and Oversized Florals Photo Credit: Envato / astrakanimages Nature-inspired designs continue to dominate the wallpaper trends, with intricate botanicals and oversized florals leading the charge. These patterns, featuring lush tropical plants and detailed botanical illustrations, bring the beauty of the outdoors inside. Perfect for those who love biophilic design, these wallpapers create a serene and refreshing environment that connects us to nature. Photo Credit: Envato / bialasiewicz Earth tones and natural finishes, such as linen or plaster, complement these designs beautifully, enhancing their organic appeal. Whether used as a feature wall or throughout a room, botanical wallpapers offer a timeless elegance that is both calming and invigorating. Getting Playful With Mixing and Matching Photo Credit: Pinterest Why settle for one wallpaper when you can mix and match to create a truly unique space? In 2025, the trend of combining different wallpapers is gaining momentum, allowing for endless creativity and personalization. By carefully selecting patterns and textures that complement each other, you can craft a cohesive yet dynamic look. Photo Credit: Pinterest Consider pairing a bold floral with a geometric print or a textured grasscloth with a subtle stripe. This approach works well in both single rooms and adjacent spaces, offering versatility and visual interest. Whether you’re looking to make a statement or add a touch of whimsy, mixing and matching wallpapers provides the perfect opportunity to express your style. Adding a Touch of Glamor Through Metallics Photo Credit: design milk Metallic finishes are set to shine, adding a touch of glamour and sophistication to any space. Gold, silver, and copper wallpapers introduce a reflective quality that catches the light beautifully, creating a sense of depth and luxury. These metallic designs are perfect for those looking to add a subtle yet impactful element to their decor. Photo Credit: Pinterest Whether used in a dining room, hallway, or accent wall, metallic wallpapers offer a timeless elegance that elevates the overall aesthetic of a room. By incorporating these shiny surfaces, you can create a space that feels both modern and opulent, making a lasting impression on anyone who enters. Personalizing Your Space With Custom Murals Photo Credits: Pinterest Custom murals are taking personalization to the next level, offering homeowners the opportunity to create truly unique and meaningful spaces. Advances in digital printing technology have made it easier than ever to design custom wall murals, allowing you to select or create patterns that reflect your personal style. From personal photographs to abstract designs, the possibilities are endless. Photo Credit: Emily May Designs Custom murals provide a stunning focal point that transforms a room into a work of art, offering a one-of-a-kind experience that is both personal and captivating. Whether used in a living room, bedroom, or office, these murals offer a creative way to express your individuality and make a lasting impression. Related Articles: Can You Paint Over Wallpaper? Yes, And Here’s How Bedroom Wallpaper Ideas: 30 Stylish Makeover Designs 10 Wallpapers That Aren’t From Your Grandma’s House For 2025, the world of custom murals and wallpapers is brimming with exciting possibilities. From whimsical patterns to tactile textures, the trends of the year offer something for everyone, allowing you to create spaces that are both beautiful and personal. Embrace the future of wall design and let your creativity shine! Ready to bring new life to your home? Subscribe to our newsletter for exclusive interior design tips, trends, and ideas that will transform your space. Click here to subscribe! Samantha Franco is a Freelance Content Writer who received her Bachelor of Arts degree in history from the University of Guelph, and her Master of Arts degree in history from the University of Western Ontario. Her research focused on Victorian, medical, and epidemiological history with a focus on childhood diseases. Stepping away from her academic [...]
html:
As we step into 2025, the world of interior design is set to embrace a vibrant transformation, with custom murals and wallpapers taking center stage. These artistic wall coverings are no longer just a backdrop but a statement piece that defines the character of a room. With an array of new trends emerging, homeowners and designers alike are excited to explore the possibilities that these creative designs offer.

Whether you’re looking to make a bold statement or add a subtle touch of elegance, the wallpaper trends of 2025 promise to inspire and captivate.

Adding Playful Charm to Your Walls Through Whimsical Patterns

Whimsical patterns are set to bring a sense of playfulness and charm to our living spaces. These designs, characterized by their cheeky and imaginative motifs, offer a delightful way to infuse personality into any room. Think of nature-inspired elements like foliage, mushrooms, and birds, or playful images such as hot air balloons and circus scenes.

The beauty of whimsical patterns lies in their ability to transform a space into a lively and inviting environment. Whether you opt for a dark, whimsigoth style or a bright, vibrant display, these patterns are sure to spark joy and creativity in your home. Embrace the unexpected and let your walls tell a story with these enchanting designs.

Creating Cozy and Dramatic Spaces with Dark and Moody Color Schemes

For those who prefer a more sophisticated and intimate atmosphere, dark and moody palettes are making a strong comeback. Rich tones like navy, emerald, and charcoal are being used to create dramatic spaces that exude elegance and warmth. These deep hues, often paired with gold or brass accents, offer a timeless and cozy setting that feels both luxurious and inviting.

By incorporating moody wallpapers into your home, you can craft a space that feels like a comforting retreat, perfect for unwinding after a long day. Whether used in a bedroom, living room, or study, these palettes provide a sense of depth and character that is both captivating and enduring.

Bringing Nature Indoors With Detailed Botanicals and Oversized Florals

Nature-inspired designs continue to dominate the wallpaper trends, with intricate botanicals and oversized florals leading the charge. These patterns, featuring lush tropical plants and detailed botanical illustrations, bring the beauty of the outdoors inside. Perfect for those who love biophilic design, these wallpapers create a serene and refreshing environment that connects us to nature.

Earth tones and natural finishes, such as linen or plaster, complement these designs beautifully, enhancing their organic appeal. Whether used as a feature wall or throughout a room, botanical wallpapers offer a timeless elegance that is both calming and invigorating.

Getting Playful With Mixing and Matching

Why settle for one wallpaper when you can mix and match to create a truly unique space? In 2025, the trend of combining different wallpapers is gaining momentum, allowing for endless creativity and personalization. By carefully selecting patterns and textures that complement each other, you can craft a cohesive yet dynamic look.

Consider pairing a bold floral with a geometric print or a textured grasscloth with a subtle stripe. This approach works well in both single rooms and adjacent spaces, offering versatility and visual interest. Whether you’re looking to make a statement or add a touch of whimsy, mixing and matching wallpapers provides the perfect opportunity to express your style.

Adding a Touch of Glamor Through Metallics

Metallic finishes are set to shine, adding a touch of glamour and sophistication to any space. Gold, silver, and copper wallpapers introduce a reflective quality that catches the light beautifully, creating a sense of depth and luxury. These metallic designs are perfect for those looking to add a subtle yet impactful element to their decor.

Whether used in a dining room, hallway, or accent wall, metallic wallpapers offer a timeless elegance that elevates the overall aesthetic of a room. By incorporating these shiny surfaces, you can create a space that feels both modern and opulent, making a lasting impression on anyone who enters.

Personalizing Your Space With Custom Murals

Custom murals are taking personalization to the next level, offering homeowners the opportunity to create truly unique and meaningful spaces. Advances in digital printing technology have made it easier than ever to design custom wall murals, allowing you to select or create patterns that reflect your personal style. From personal photographs to abstract designs, the possibilities are endless.

Custom murals provide a stunning focal point that transforms a room into a work of art, offering a one-of-a-kind experience that is both personal and captivating. Whether used in a living room, bedroom, or office, these murals offer a creative way to express your individuality and make a lasting impression.

Related Articles:

  • Can You Paint Over Wallpaper? Yes, And Here’s How
  • Bedroom Wallpaper Ideas: 30 Stylish Makeover Designs
  • 10 Wallpapers That Aren’t From Your Grandma’s House

For 2025, the world of custom murals and wallpapers is brimming with exciting possibilities. From whimsical patterns to tactile textures, the trends of the year offer something for everyone, allowing you to create spaces that are both beautiful and personal. Embrace the future of wall design and let your creativity shine!

Ready to bring new life to your home? Subscribe to our newsletter for exclusive interior design tips, trends, and ideas that will transform your space. Click here to subscribe!

Samantha Franco is a Freelance Content Writer who received her Bachelor of Arts degree in history from the University of Guelph, and her Master of Arts degree in history from the University of Western Ontario. Her research focused on Victorian, medical, and epidemiological history with a focus on childhood diseases. Stepping away from her academic [...]
